title: Чудо
overview: Miracle is a show where children rule the ball. The young guests, along with their parents, will come to the studio to surprise everyone with their skills, as well as tell the whole country about themselves.146 children from different parts of Russia and neighboring countries became participants of the project. Children from Moscow and the Moscow region, St. Petersburg, Kaliningrad, Krasnodar, Novorossiysk, Yevpatoria, Samara, Tula, Yakutia, Buryatia, Kogalym, Arkhangelsk and other cities and regions of the country will show their skills on the air. In addition, young talents from Belarus, Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan will take to the stage of the show.The young participants of the show will demonstrate their vocal abilities and acting talents, play musical instruments, show circus performances and dances of various directions — from break dancing to ballet.
